results.title: Use Consul as a membership provider - .NET
results.description: Use Consul as a membership provider Consul is a distributed, highly available, and data center-aware service discovery platform including simple service registration, health checking, failure detection, and key-value storage.  ...view of Consul, including comparisons with similar solutions, is available at What is ConsulAs an Orleans Membership.

results.title: Using HashiCorp Consul to connect Kubernetes clusters on Azure
results.description: Episode Using HashiCorp Consul to connect Kubernetes clusters on Azure Azure Friday HashiCorp Consul is a distributed service mesh to connect, secure, and configure services across any runtime platform and public or private cloud.  ...ode, Scott Hanselman is joined by HashiCorp's Geoffrey Grossenbach who uses Helm to install a Consul server to.
